# WireframeUI Component Library

## Overview
WireframeUI is a minimalist web component library that provides wireframe-style UI components for prototype design and interface demonstrations. 

### Basic Components

#### Button (wire-button)
A simple button component with wireframe styling.
- **Usage**: `<wire-button>Click me</wire-button>`
- **Attributes**: None

#### Input (wire-input)
A text input field with wireframe styling.
- **Usage**: `<wire-input></wire-input>`
- **Attributes**: None

#### Card (wire-card)
A container component with header, body, and footer sections.
- **Usage**: 
  ```html
  <wire-card>
    <div slot="header">Card Header</div>
    <div slot="body">Card Content</div>
    <div slot="footer">Card Footer</div>
  </wire-card>
  ```
- **Slots**: header, body, footer

#### Badge (wire-badge)
A small badge component for displaying status or counts.
- **Usage**: `<wire-badge>New</wire-badge>`
- **Attributes**: None

#### Avatar (wire-avatar)
A component for displaying user avatars.
- **Usage**: `<wire-avatar>JD</wire-avatar>` or `<wire-avatar><img src="avatar.jpg" alt="User"></wire-avatar>`
- **Attributes**: shape (circle, square)

#### Alert (wire-alert)
A component for displaying alert messages.
- **Usage**: `<wire-alert>This is an alert message</wire-alert>`
- **Attributes**: None

### Layout Components

#### Panel (wire-panel)
A container component for grouping related content.
- **Usage**: `<wire-panel>Content</wire-panel>`
- **Attributes**: None

#### Row (wire-row)
A horizontal layout component.
- **Usage**: `<wire-row>Content</wire-row>`
- **Attributes**: None

#### Column (wire-column)
A vertical layout component.
- **Usage**: `<wire-column>Content</wire-column>`
- **Attributes**: None

#### Section (wire-section)
A component for defining page sections.
- **Usage**: `<wire-section>Content</wire-section>`
- **Attributes**: None

### Interactive Components

#### Toggle (wire-toggle)
A switch component representing an on/off state.
- **Usage**: `<wire-toggle></wire-toggle>` or `<wire-toggle checked></wire-toggle>`
- **Attributes**: checked

#### Select (wire-select)
A dropdown select component.
- **Usage**: 
  ```html
  <wire-select>
    <div slot="value">Selected Option</div>
    <wire-select-option>Option 1</wire-select-option>
    <wire-select-option selected>Option 2</wire-select-option>
    <wire-select-option>Option 3</wire-select-option>
  </wire-select>
  ```
- **Attributes**: None
- **Related Components**: wire-select-option

#### Combobox (wire-combobox)
A combination of input field and dropdown list.
- **Usage**: `<wire-combobox></wire-combobox>`
- **Attributes**: None

#### Accordion (wire-accordion)
A collapsible content panel.
- **Usage**: `<wire-accordion>Content</wire-accordion>`
- **Attributes**: None

#### Tabs (wire-tabs)
A tabbed interface for organizing content.
- **Usage**: 
  ```html
  <wire-tabs>
    <wire-tab>Tab 1</wire-tab>
    <wire-tab>Tab 2</wire-tab>
    <wire-tab-panel>Content 1</wire-tab-panel>
    <wire-tab-panel>Content 2</wire-tab-panel>
  </wire-tabs>
  ```
- **Related Components**: wire-tab, wire-tab-panel

#### Checkbox (wire-checkbox)
A checkbox input component.
- **Usage**: `<wire-checkbox></wire-checkbox>` or `<wire-checkbox checked></wire-checkbox>`
- **Attributes**: checked

#### Radio Group (wire-radio-group)
A group of radio button options.
- **Usage**: 
  ```html
  <wire-radio-group>
    <wire-radio value="option1">Option 1</wire-radio>
    <wire-radio value="option2" checked>Option 2</wire-radio>
    <wire-radio value="option3">Option 3</wire-radio>
  </wire-radio-group>
  ```
- **Related Components**: wire-radio

#### Slider (wire-slider)
A slider component for selecting a value from a range.
- **Usage**: `<wire-slider></wire-slider>` or `<wire-slider value="50"></wire-slider>`
- **Attributes**: value

### Utility Components

#### Icon (wire-icon)
A component for displaying Lucide icons.
- **Usage**: `<wire-icon name="check"></wire-icon>` or `<wire-icon name="alert-triangle" size="24"></wire-icon>`
- **Attributes**: name (Lucide 图标名称), size (图标大小，默认为 24)



#### Message (wire-message)
A component for displaying system messages.
- **Usage**: `<wire-message>This is a message</wire-message>`
- **Attributes**: None

#### Heading (wire-heading)
A component for displaying headings with consistent styling.
- **Usage**: `<wire-heading level="1">Heading</wire-heading>`
- **Attributes**: level (1-6)

#### Status Indicator (wire-status-indicator)
A component for displaying status information.
- **Usage**: `<wire-status-indicator status="online"></wire-status-indicator>`
- **Attributes**: status (online, offline, away, busy)

## Styling

### Common Wireframe Styles
All components share these common wireframe styling characteristics:
- Solid borders (1px solid #9ca3af)
- Neutral gray color (#6b7280)
- Transparent backgrounds
- Disabled user selection
- Simple, clean layout with appropriate padding and spacing
- No hover effects or complex interaction states

### CSS Variables
The library does not currently use CSS variables for theming, maintaining a consistent wireframe appearance across all components.

## Usage

### Installation
```bash
npm install wireframeui
```

or

```bash
yarn add wireframeui
```

### Basic Usage
```html
<!-- Import the library -->
<script type="module" src="path/to/wireframe.js"></script>

<!-- Use the components -->
<wire-button>Click me</wire-button>
<wire-input></wire-input>
<wire-card>
  <div slot="header">Card Title</div>
  <div slot="body">Card Content</div>
</wire-card>
```

## Browser Support
WireframeUI supports all modern browsers that implement the Web Components standard.
